channel.title: [RuneSource 317]RuneFocus v1.5
channel.description:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg690/scaled.php?server=690&filename=runefocusbanner.png&res=medium[/img]
Hello. The first time I've seen a RuneSource, I've wanted to do something out of it. Most RuneSource's/Azure are being released only with skills, with not much features and practicly no combat.
RuneSource 317: Azure: v1.5
Download Link: [url=http://uppit.com/xij0ie577sn5/RuneFocus_v1.5.rar]http://uppit.com/xij0ie577sn5/RuneFocus_v1.5.rar[/url]
Videos: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dq9K9hDDyb8][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dq9K9hDDyb8[/youtube][/url]
I`ve been working on this for a bit, and this is what I got out:
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]Fishing Base[/li] [li]WoodCutting started from scratch[/li] [li]Full Herblore[/li] [li]Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs, XP[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]Fixed the shortbow glitch[/li] [li]Fixed ground item stacking[/li] [li]Fixed the equipment bug[/li] [li]All emotions[/li] [li]Teleporting[/li] [li]Teleporting with level requirments[/li] [li]Eating[/li] [li]Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up your skills..[/li] [li]Animation/gfx support[/li] [li]Few shops[/li] [li]Npc spawns[/li] [li]Loads global objects[/li] [li]Started a skilling base[/li] [li]Messaging[/li] [li]Split Chat[/li] [li]Wielding Level requirments[/li] [li]Yell system[/li] [li]PlayerEditor - edits a char file[/li] [li]Fletching with interfaces[/li] [li]Cooking with Interfaces, almost all raws[/li] [li]WoodCutting[/li] [li]RuneCrafting[/li] [li]Worked on some Fixes[/li] [li]Fixed Running(the button packet)[/li] [li]Started Firemaking - Needs force walking and object creating (all logs work) - u can't use fm since I've havent even started the use item[/li][/ul] I will be releasing newer and newer version of RuneFocus, since I love to work on the RuneSource.
Pictures:
Emotions :) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg42/scaled.php?server=42&filename=emotes.png&res=medium[/img] Cooking
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg809/scaled.php?server=809&filename=cookingkarambwan.png&res=medium[/img] Anims
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg88/scaled.php?server=88&filename=cookingwithanims.png&res=medium[/img] Woodcutting [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg200/scaled.php?server=200&filename=woodcuttingj.png&res=medium[/img] Runecrafting [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg687/scaled.php?server=687&filename=runecraftingy.png&res=medium[/img] Fletching with Interfaces [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg51/scaled.php?server=51&filename=fletchingwithinterfaces.png&res=medium[/img] Fletching anims, messages [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg692/scaled.php?server=692&filename=fletchinglvlup.png&res=medium[/img] Fishing [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=fishingo.png&res=medium[/img] Herb cleaning [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg850/scaled.php?server=850&filename=cleaningherbs.png&res=medium[/img] Making potions [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg27/scaled.php?server=27&filename=potionmaking.png&res=medium[/img] ~Eating/Potting~
[ul][li]All Food - All working[/li] [li]Almost all Potions - none working yet[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg716/scaled.php?server=716&filename=pottingandeating.png&res=medium[/img]
~Crafting gems~
[ul][li]Includes : sapphire,emerald,ruby,diamond,dragonstone and onyx[/li] [li]Level requirments[/li] [li]Animation[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg89/scaled.php?server=89&filename=gemcutting.png&res=medium[/img] LVL Req [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg824/scaled.php?server=824&filename=craftingwithrequirments.png&res=medium[/img] ~Leather Crafting~
[ul][li]Leather Crafting got just started it doesn't work yet, it only shows the Interface by using the needle on the dhide[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg839/scaled.php?server=839&filename=fletchingscratch.png&res=medium[/img] ~Teleporting~
[ul][li]Proper Gfx and timer[/li] [li]Proper animation[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg717/scaled.php?server=717&filename=teleporting.png&res=medium[/img] Basic yell system
[ul][li]Player[/li] [li]Moderator[/li] [li]Administrator[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=yellsystem.png&res=medium[/img] ~Combat~
[ul][li]Need to be worked on, it`s just a base[/li] [li]Anims[/li] [li]facing[/li] [li]interfaces[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg705/scaled.php?server=705&filename=whipemote.png&res=medium[/img]
In my next Release, expect more fabulous stuff added to this great base.
RuneFocus v1.0 Downloads:
Download Link: Uppit: [url=http://uppit.com/ayiqzq9nb6d2/RuneFocus_v1.0.rar]http://uppit.com/ayiqzq9nb6d2/RuneFocus_v1.0.rar[/url] Dropbox(Direct Download): [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36130389/RuneFocus%20v1.0.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36130389/RuneFocus%20v1.0.rar[/url]
[b]Credits:[/b]
[ul][li][b]Blakeman[/b][/li] [li][b]BFMV[/b][/li] [li][b]Satan666[/b][/li] [li][b]I Roll Deep[/b][/li] [li][b]~synchronized[/b][/li][/ul]

item.title: [RuneSource 317]RuneFocus v1.5
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“BorigTheDwarf, post:158, topic:413384”]Mate, no disrespect or nothing intended but you started your description by implying there was something wrong with all the Runesource based servers being released with practically no combat and only skills and then you released a Runesource based server with practically no combat and some nicely written skills.[/quote]RS was released without combat as IK. I released a server with “shitty” combat, because it’s shitty, and with some nice written skills. Thank you

Read full topic

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I thought RuneSource and Delta were the same? Anyways still good job I think.

Oh lord, you are FAR wrong, RuneSource out-preforms Delta by at least 500 times.
